conversations.content:
Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You are late.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tu es en retard.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You must read this book also.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tu dois également lire ce livre.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Did you take him home?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
L'avez-vous emmené chez vous ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'She did the right thing.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Elle fit ce qu'il fallait.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'We're not there yet.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Nous n'y sommes pas encore.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'May I have your phone number, please?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Pourrais-je avoir votre numéro de téléphone, s'il vous plaît ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I bear him no malice.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je n'ai aucune malveillance à son égard.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Have you ever argued with your parents?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
T'es-tu déjà disputé avec tes parents ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Where did you get that shirt?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Où as-tu eu cette chemise ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Our ultimate goal is to establish world peace.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Notre ultime but est d'établir la paix dans le monde.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'We're counting on you to wake us up in time, so don't fall asleep.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
On compte sur toi pour nous réveiller à l'heure, alors ne t'endors pas.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Prices have been rising since last year.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Les prix montent depuis l'année dernière.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'The chair is too small.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Cette chaise est trop petite.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'It's not a good idea.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ce n'est pas une bonne idée.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Can't you understand the pain of your parents?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ne pouvez-vous comprendre la douleur de vos parents ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Tom announced his resignation yesterday.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tom a annoncé sa démission hier.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I believe the choice is clear.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je crois que le choix est évident.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Do you know who wrote this book?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Sais-tu qui a écrit ce livre ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I told Mary that I loved her.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'ai dit à Mary que je l'aimais.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I thought maybe I could buy you a drink.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'ai pensé que je pourrais peut-être te payer un verre.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I never see you without thinking of my father.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je ne vous vois jamais sans penser à mon père.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'A good case can be made for the legalization of drugs.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Une bonne défense peut être faite de la légalisation de la drogue.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'It's really not that heavy.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ce n'est vraiment pas si lourd.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Don't raise your voice.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
N'élevez pas la voix !

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Lojban is the Salvador Dalí of languages.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Le lojban est le Salvador Dali des langues.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Speak more slowly, please.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
S'il vous plait, parlez plus lentement.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'If you trespass on his property, he'll sic his dogs on you.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Si vous faites intrusion dans sa propriété, il lâchera ses chiens sur vous.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I just wanted to tell you how pleased I am.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je voulais juste vous dire combien j'étais satisfait.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I often go downtown on Sunday.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je vais souvent en centre-ville le dimanche.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Let's forget to study and enjoy ourselves tonight.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Oublions les études et amusons-nous ce soir.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'We don't like these stories, probably you either.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ces histoires ne nous plaisent pas, à vous non plus, peut-être.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Let me repair it.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Laisse-moi le réparer.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'It wasn't a race.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ce n'était pas une course.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I think you ought to listen.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je pense que tu devrais écouter.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Do you have any more of those?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Vous en reste-t-il ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Tony has a nice voice.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tony a une voix agréable.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I chose the colors.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'ai choisi les couleurs.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Their contract is to run out at the end of this month.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Leur contrat vient à expiration à la fin de ce mois.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Why didn't you just tell the truth?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Pourquoi n'avez-vous pas simplement dit la vérité ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'He asked me to keep him company on the weekends.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il m'a demandé de lui tenir compagnie pendant les week-ends.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I blame you for this, Tom.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je te blâme pour ceci, Tom.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Mary doesn't have a pooch; she has a kitten.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Marie n'a pas de cabot; elle a un chaton.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I know that it is highly unlikely that we'll be able to sell all this stuff.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je sais qu'il est hautement improbable que nous soyons en mesure de vendre tous ces trucs.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'To hear him talk, you might take him for a girl.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
À l'entendre parler, on pourrait le prendre pour une fille.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Everyone seems to have a bone to pick with someone, but only a few people can be philosophical about it.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Chacun semble avoir un compte à régler avec quelqu'un, mais seulement quelques personnes peuvent le prendre avec philosophie.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'No matter what game he plays, he always wins.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Qu'importe le jeu auquel il joue, il gagne toujours.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'He was sick, so he couldn't attend the party.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il était malade, de sorte qu'il n'a pas pu assister à la fête.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'He put forward a plan for improving the rate of production.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il présenta un programme pour augmenter le taux de production.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'We are going to the market.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Nous nous rendons au marché.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I'm now busy writing a book.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je suis occupé en ce moment à écrire un livre.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'This is the safest place I know.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
C'est l'endroit le plus sûr que je connaisse.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I thought I heard you.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je pensais que je vous avais entendu.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'How long were you in Japan?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Combien de temps as-tu été au Japon ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I just feel so lost.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je me sens tellement perdu.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'The recent events have affected him deeply.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Les récents événements l'ont profondément affecté.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You'll like it, believe me.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Vous l'aimerez, croyez-moi.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'That's all they have.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
C'est tout ce qu'ils ont.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Learn Italian.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Apprends l'italien.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I need you here.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'ai besoin de vous ici.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'It took me three hours to finish my homework.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ça m'a pris trois heures pour finir mes devoirs.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Is this what you want?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Est-ce là ce que tu veux ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I didn't do it for you.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je ne l'ai pas fait pour vous.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You're absolutely right.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Vous avez parfaitement raison.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Do you think you'd like to work for us?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Pensez-vous que vous aimeriez travailler avec nous ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You think I'm stupid, don't you?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tu penses que je suis stupide, n'est-ce pas ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Please don't do this.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
S'il te plaît, ne fais pas ça.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Sound familiar?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Cela vous semble-t-il familier ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You don't have to come.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tu n'es pas forcé de venir.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Sorry. Traffic was heavy.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Désolé. La circulation était dense.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You were my friend.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tu fus mon amie.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'There is no rose without a thorn.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il n’y a pas de roses sans épines.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I must run.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je dois courir.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I'll never forget the look on her face.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je n'oublierai jamais l'air qu'arborait son visage.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I'll be in the truck.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je me trouverai dans le camion.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'If you take this medicine, you'll feel better.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Si tu prends ce remède, tu te sentiras mieux.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Don't be so harsh on yourself.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ne soyez pas si dure avec vous-même.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I caught it.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je l'ai attrapé.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Tom seems happy.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tom a l'air heureux.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I want white pants.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je veux un pantalon blanc.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'We'll decide later.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Nous en déciderons plus tard.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I have a new girlfriend.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'ai une nouvelle copine.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Switzerland needs better apples.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
La Suisse a besoin de meilleures pommes.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Are you still upset about what happened?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Êtes-vous encore contrariées à propos de ce qui a eu lieu ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I am peeling the celery and the potatoes.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je pèle le céleri et les pommes de terre.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You're very observant.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Vous êtes très observatrice.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Tom wants to sell everything in his garage.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tom veut vendre tout ce qu'il a dans son garage.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I'm sick of your hints.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'en ai marre de tes allusions.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'That's not a good choice.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ce n'est pas un bon choix.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I'm pretty sure that Tom doesn't like Mary.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je suis presque certain que Tom n'aime pas Marie.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Keep still!'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Restez tranquille !

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'There's something I have to tell you.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'ai quelque chose à te dire.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I think you didn't watch the video to the end.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je pense que tu n'as pas regardé la vidéo jusqu'à la fin.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'In other words, I don't like to work with him.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
En d'autres mots, je n'aime pas travailler avec lui.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Instead, they prefer to stay in and watch television.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Au lieu de cela, ils préfèrent rester à l'intérieur et regarder la télévision.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'What does your son do?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Que fait ton fils ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'There's a special exhibit of Picasso's sketches.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il y a une exposition spéciale de croquis de Picasso.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'A bottle of water goes for 5 francs in Bastions Park!'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Une bouteille d'eau se vend pour 5 francs dans le Parc des Bastions !

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'What are we supposed to do now?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Que sommes-nous supposés faire maintenant ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'The best way to know what a country is like is to go and see it with your own eyes.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
La meilleure façon de savoir comment est un pays est d'y aller pour voir de ses propres yeux.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'There's something else in the drawer.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il y a autre chose dans le tiroir.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'After the university, she was free to choose her destiny.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Après l'université, elle était libre de décider de son avenir.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Mary is meticulous.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Marie est minutieuse.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I live in Moscow.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je vis à Moscou.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'English is spoken in many countries.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
On parle l'anglais dans de nombreux pays.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I don't know exactly when he will arrive.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je ne sais pas exactement quand il arrivera.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I know what it's like to be different.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je sais ce que c'est que d'être différent.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Does that make sense to you?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Cela a-t-il du sens pour toi ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'A fire broke out in the middle of the city.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Un feu se déclara au cœur de la ville.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'We'd better do something about this leak.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Nous ferions mieux de faire quelque chose au sujet de cette fuite.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Soccer is one of my little brother's hobbies.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Le football est un des passe-temps de mon petit frère.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'She baked me a cake.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Elle me fit un gâteau.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I know what you could've done.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je sais ce que tu aurais pu faire.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'What are you talking about!?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
De quoi parles-tu ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'She's a bad influence.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Elle a une mauvaise influence.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Algeria is a Third World country that is sinking deeper and deeper, and is on the brink of civil war.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
L'Algérie est un pays du tiers monde qui s'enfonce de plus en plus et qui est au bord de la guerre civile.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I have made many sacrifices for my country.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'ai accompli de nombreux sacrifices pour mon pays.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I'd like to see Mr Kosugi.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'aimerais voir M. Kosugi.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Everybody's worried.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tout le monde est inquiet.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I wonder if Tom has ever considered cycling to work.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je me demande si Tom a jamais envisagé de se rendre au travail à vélo.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'There are twenty seven pupils in my class.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il y'a vingt-sept élèves dans ma classe.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'What would you like to know?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Qu'est-ce que tu voudrais connaître ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'That sick person's life is in danger.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
La vie de cette personne malade est en danger.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Whatever I do, she says I can do better.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Quoique je fasse, elle dit que je peux faire mieux.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You don't even know how.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tu ne sais même pas comment.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'We found Tom drunk sleeping on a park bench.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Nous avons trouvé Tom saoul, dormant sur un banc du parc.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'According to the radio, it will rain tomorrow.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Selon la radio, il va pleuvoir demain.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'My little brother always sleeps with his teddy bear.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Mon petit frère dort toujours avec son ours en peluche.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'My dad works all day.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Mon papa travaille toute la journée.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'His grandmother can't walk, can she?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Sa grand-mère ne peut pas marcher, n'est-ce pas ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Their feet are dirty.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Elles ont les pieds sales.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'In this activity one immediately sees the result.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Dans ce métier on voit tout de suite les résultats.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I need to lose five pounds.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il faut que je perde cinq livres.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'He is an ideal husband for me.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
C'est un mari idéal pour moi.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'He is not a poet but a novelist.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il n'est pas poète mais romancier.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'They admitted they were cold.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ils ont admis qu'ils avaient froid.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'My country is far away from Japan.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Mon pays est éloigné du Japon.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'They are now either in Kyoto or in Osaka.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ils sont à présent soit à Kyoto, soit à Osaka.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'She wrote about it in her diary.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Elle y a fait référence dans son journal.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'The best things in life aren't things.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Les meilleures choses dans la vie ne sont pas des choses.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'The French chose the South for this summer.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Les Français ont choisi le Sud pour cet été.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You just made that up, didn't you?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tu viens d'inventer ça, n'est-ce pas ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Do you know how many there are?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Savez-vous combien il y en a ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'No, Dad!'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Non, papa !

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'This is my mom.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
C'est ma maman.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'It's completely normal.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
C'est parfaitement normal.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Everyone's in the buff, in there.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tout le monde est à poil, là-dedans.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Do you already have a plan?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
As-tu déjà un plan?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Don't worry. Everything is going well.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ne t'inquiète pas trop. Tout va bien.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'We wasted a lot of time looking for Tom.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Nous avons perdu beaucoup de temps à chercher Tom.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'He told me that the book was interesting.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il m'a dit que le livre était intéressant.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Chinese officials say economic growth has dropped to a three-year low because of the world economy.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Les officiels chinois disent que la croissance économique est tombée à son plus bas niveau depuis trois ans en raison de l'économie mondiale.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Be bold!'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Soyez hardies !

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Is she all right?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Se porte-t-elle bien ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I love the way you kiss.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'adore la manière dont vous embrassez.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Spring is the best season to visit Kyoto.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Le printemps est la meilleure saison pour visiter Kyoto.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'He devoted a lot of time to study.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Il a consacré beaucoup de temps à l'étude.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'War is a terrible thing.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
La guerre est une chose horrible.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Don't lean on my desk.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Ne vous adossez pas à mon bureau.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Please show me what to do next.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Montre-moi la prochaine chose à faire.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Is there a hotel around here?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Y a-t-il un hôtel près d'ici ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Young people tend to take things too far.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Les jeunes gens ont tendance à aller trop loin.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You are supposed to introduce yourselves in turn.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Vous voudrez bien vous présenter chacun à votre tour.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'We were forced to work hard.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Nous étions forcés à travailler dur.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I don't think I can eat this.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je ne pense pas que je parvienne à manger ça.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I'll check your vision.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je vais contrôler votre vue.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I can't recall all their names.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Je ne peux pas me souvenir de tous leurs noms.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I thought you wanted this back.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'ai pensé que tu voudrais que je te rende ceci.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Sami will be gone soon.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Sami partira dans peu de temps.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'Have you got jeans in my size?'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Avez-vous des jeans de ma taille ?

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'She gave me the fish eye.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Elle me lança un œil noir.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'I love onions!'
Output the translation and only the translation.
J'adore les oignons !

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'They can't do that.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Elles n'arrivent pas à faire ça.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'She's bleeding.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Elle saigne.

Translate the following sentence from English to French: 'You'd be the one to know.'
Output the translation and only the translation.
Tu serais celle qui est au courant.
